name: Potion Panic (stephen-berry, NOIROVA, tiago-a-ribeiro)
description:
This game was made for the Godot Wild Jam #49 Hosted by Bakenshake, Godot Wild Jam. The theme is "Unstable", portals teleport your tools and the recipes in your book will jumble up, nothing stays the same! Objective:

Your tree friend has gotten himself in an unusual situation and has fallen ill. Use your book to create a series of antidotes before his time runs out! 

GOAL: Make the potions you see at the top of the screen and give them to your tree friend. Look in your book to see recipes, and grab ingredients from the red boxes. Put ingredients in the cauldron, grinder or brewer, then click on them to play a minigame to make the potion. Controls:
  • Movement: WASD 
  • Interact: K
Contributions:
  • stephen-berry (Coding, Music)
  • tiago-a-ribeiro (Coding, Art, Game Design, Overlord)
  • noirova (Sound Designer, Creative Admin)
Tree and fence models were taken from here: https://devilsworkshop.itch.io/lowpoly-forest-pack
Font: https://ggbot.itch.io/kaph-font
Cauldron Sound is sampled from "Fantasy Complete" by Monument Studios: https://www.monumentstudios.net/
